1.title: From Squirrels to Brown Bears
1.plot: Amy Skaar is married to a life-long hunter. Her only experience behind the gun is hunting squirrel, until she decides to go after the apex predator of North America, in this Kodiak brown bear hunt.

2.title: Black Death with Father and Son
2.plot: Brad Severs and his son Chris hunt cape buffalo in South Africa with Omujeve Safaris, while hunter Ann Meyer pursues a massive crocodile.

3.title: The Captain's Call
3.plot: Retired Army Captain Troy Givens and friend Dan Harrison are on a do-it-yourself hunt for black bear on Alaska's Kuiu Island. To get a chance to take a clean shot, Troy must wade through 100 yards of thick mud.

4.title: Buffalo Tracks
4.plot: Steve LeBlanc hunts massive cape buffalo and crocodile in South Africa with Omujeve Safaris. Along the way, he explains the benefits to the local economy and wildlife from big game hunting.

5.title: Boating for Bear
5.plot: Colorado hunting guide Dan Harrison is on a self-guided hunt with good friend Captain Troy Givens for black bear. While Troy already has a bruin down, Dan must conquer a leaky raft and a wayward gas can to take his own.

6.title: The Cape Buffalo of a Lifetime
6.plot: Chris Severs has already passed on a trophy cape buffalo and now could regret the decision, as time runs out on his hunt. His father, Brad Severs, hunts giant kudu during this father-son safari.

7.title: The Charge
7.plot: When a cape buffalo charges a hunter, one of them is going to die. Hunter Juan Cruz Anon faces a life and death scenario, when a cape buffalo makes a deadly charge.

8.title: The Big Five
8.plot: Africa's Big Five are powerful, magnificent, and deadly; they all have a unique style of delivering punishment to their intended victims; we look at the personalities of the elephant, lion, cape buffalo, leopard, and rhinoceros.

9.title: Beware of the Bear
9.plot: As the world's largest land-based predator, the brown bear of Alaska has no peer in the animal kingdom; a look at four hunts for the apex predator of North America.

10.title: The Magic of Africa
10.plot: Hunters Brad Severs and Steve Leblanc head back to Africa, once more to square off against the continent's biggest, most ill tempered beasts including the big five.

1.title: Passing the Torch in Tanzania
1.plot: Father, son, and Uncle - Jim, James, and David DiBlasio travel to Tanzania, where young James is baptized into the world of dangerous game pursuit.

2.title: Brown Bear by a Hair
2.plot: Third times a charm for an Alaska native as he heads to Afognak Island to hunt with Kodiak Bob May.

3.title: The Buffalo Slam
3.plot: Of all the "grand slams" around the world - getting all 3 African species of buffalo is by far the most potentially lethal.

4.title: Upping the Ante
4.plot: Taking an elephant is dangerous enough - attempting to take one with a cross bow or hand gun is on a whole other level.

5.title: Dangerous for a Reason
5.plot: Deadliest Hunts features hunters pursuing animals that are considered "Dangerous Game" - these are the tales of hunts where not everything went according to plan.

6.title: Maneaters
6.plot: Though their brown cousins tend to have a more fearsome reputation, black bears are responsible for considerably more attacks every year - and unlike browns, their intention is often to kill and eat you.

7.title: Last Light Leopards
7.plot: Young James DiBlasio continues his initiation into the realm of dangerous game hunting as he and his father chase the elusive and ferocious leopard with famed PH, Jeff Rann.

8.title: Country vs. Country
8.plot: Dangerous game can be found around the world, but the Dark Continent is where a hunter goes to truly test his or her skill. These are the top African destinations to look death square in the eye... and fight back.

9.title: Return to Africa Part 1
9.plot: Part one of hunter Susan Moultan's return to Africa. Several years after taking an elephant, she continue her quest for Africa's Big 5.

10.title: Return to Africa Part 2
10.plot: Part two of hunter Susan Moultan's return to Africa. Several years after taking an elephant, she continue her quest for Africa's Big 5.

imdb.plot outline: Enter a world where the hunter becomes the hunted, and a split-second decision means the difference between life and death. 'Deadliest Hunts' takes you along on heart-pounding hunts for the planet's most fearsome beasts: elephant, cape buffalo, leopard, brown bear and many others. Join these intrepid hunters as they travel to some of the world's most exotic locations to pursue its deadliest predators.
imdb.title: Deadliest Hunts
plot: Enter a world where the hunter becomes the hunted, and a split-second decision means the difference between life and death. '_Deadliest Hunts_ (qv)' takes you along on heart-pounding hunts for the planet's most fearsome beasts: elephant, cape buffalo, leopard, brown bear and many others. Join these intrepid hunters as they travel to some of the world's most exotic locations to pursue its deadliest predators.::Outdoor Channel
